case.title: Looking for Help asap - 21 (new york)
case.text: Hi...really on hard times now n don't know anything else to do im 21 yrs old ebony bbw recently came n work hard got on my feet and something bad happened where im at square one n really have no where to go no family here n tryna hard not to give up n leave I wanna make it here really hoping I can get help today...I know nothing is free hope here from someone real n serious. ..
